name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing scalable, resilient applications using **Python**, **Kotlin**, **AWS**, **MySQL**, and **Kubernetes**. Adept in building user-friendly interfaces utilizing **React** and **Vue**, and implementing CI/CD practices for seamless deployment. Proven expertise in **Traffic Management**, **Observability**, and **Incident Response** to enhance operational efficiency and system resilience. Known for my ability to improve processes through automation and strong commitment to documentation, code review, and effective communication. Successfully delivered complex solutions in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, driving significant improvements in automation and architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Kotlin** for developing efficient microservices, achieving a reduction in system latency by **25%**.
Implemented CI/CD methodologies using **AWS** tools, ensuring consistent delivery and reducing deployment frequency by **80%**.
Designed and optimized MySQL databases, enhancing query performance by **60%** through effective indexing and optimization strategies.
Led the development of dynamic frontend components using **React** and **Vue**, improving user experience and reducing page load time by **30%**.
Employed **Kubernetes** for orchestration of microservices in AWS EKS, maintaining robust system resilience with **99.9%** uptime.
Integrated observability tools to enhance incident response times, ultimately improving operational efficiency by **40%**.
Conducted thorough code reviews and maintained comprehensive documentation to uphold development standards and facilitate team communication.

• Utilized **AWS** for cloud solutions, enhancing operational efficiency and reducing infrastructure costs by **30%**.
• Developed backend services with **Python** and **Kotlin**, improving response time for applications by **25%**.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **Kubernetes**, achieving a **50%** reduction in deployment time.
• Enhanced system resilience and automation through **MySQL** optimizations, improving data retrieval speed by **40%**.
• Led code review sessions, elevating code quality and documentation standards for a team of **9** engineers.
• Collaborated on observability strategies, which resulted in a **15%** reduction in incident response times.
• Designed intuitive user interfaces using **React** and **Vue**, which led to a **20%** increase in user engagement metrics.

• Developed backend APIs using **Python** and **Kotlin**, improving system resilience and operational efficiency.
• Deployed solutions with **AWS** services, ensuring global accessibility and low-latency performance.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines to enhance automation and streamline deployment processes, achieving a 30% reduction in deployment time.
• Conducted code reviews, ensuring high-quality standards and fostering effective communication across the team.
• Established observability practices to improve incident response times by 25% and maintain system stability.
• Enhanced database interactions with **MySQL**, optimizing query performance and overall system responsiveness.
• Participated in traffic management strategies to ensure seamless user experiences during high-traffic events, maintaining 99% uptime.
• Collaborated on frontend development using **React** and **Vue**, providing modern user interfaces with responsive design principles.
